traits.name: Leaf Camouflage
traits.desc: While unmoving, the sorcerer is indistinguishable from an ordinary cluster of leaves.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The sorcerer’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: * 1/day each: animal friendship, color spray, fog cloud

actions.name: Razor Leaf
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.
